Content: Thank you very much for participating in our playtest@ what you have just experienced is an early model of our game. Based on the gameplay experience@ we would like your feedback and suggestions for the game.
Which of the following side-scrolling games is your favorite?
What's your preference for side-scolling game
We would like to visualise the life value of the character@ what colour would you prefer to use to represent the life value.
We would like to improve our graphics@ which part would you like to improve the most.
Specific Images of the game's protagonists and enemies
All the suggestions just made are very valuable and we will improve the graphics of the game. Where do you want the game to take place?
What type of the monster are you afraid of?
